description:
Brothers in Battle, Best of Friends Audio Book
  
 
Brothers in Battle, Best of Friends:
Two WWII Paratroopers from the Original Band of Brothers Tell Their Story
Authors: William \"Wild Bill\" Guarnere and Edward \"Babe\" Heffron, with Robyn Post, and an introduction by Tom Hanks
Reader: Dick Hill 

They belonged to the elite unit of the 101st Airborne Division in WWII, portrayed in the HBO miniseries Band of Brothers.
